nodes.text: Argin was a human male who resided in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu during the war between the First Order and the Resistance. He and Bishta planned to steal from the collector Dok-Ondar's antiquities store, but after hearing of the recent death of Kase Finto, who had been killed after attempting to scam Dok-Ondar, Argin warned Bishta against doing the job.
